dialogues.text: He's not your father!

dialogues.speaker: TIGHT ON DAN'S OUTSTRETCHED HAND
dialogues.text: suddenly BONE LIKE CLAWS emerge from DAN's FINGERTIPS!

dialogues.speaker: JACOB
dialogues.text: turns and runs! FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kids!  Always a disappointment. FREDDY/DAN snarls, enraged and charges after Jacob.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob runs for Alice, who picks him up in her arms as he  reaches her.  As she sees Freddy approach, she turns and  runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice finds herself at the end of the staircase which she run down.  She stands in the vast, impossibly large crypt beneath the asylum.  Huge, ancient columns inscribed with hieroglyphic and indented with the faces of dead souls  support the roof far above.   One staircase leads to the asylum through which the souls the maniacs can be heard and another, apparently, leads t the real world: Alice's bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as she puts Jacob down and turns to face Freddy.  But he' nowhere to be seen.  Alice whirls around looking for him.

dialogues.speaker: ON JACOB
dialogues.text: his brow furrowed in thought. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he? JACOB (pauses before answering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's inside you, where he hides.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: looks at him in amazement. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean? JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's where he hides out.  Inside.  That's  how he found me.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: a look of horrified realization crosses her face. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how...? JACOB (interrupting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He says it's easy.  Especially with sad  people.  With closed-off people.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: stares at Jacob thoughtfully.  A look of determination da on her face. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, Krueger.  This time it's for  keeps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Alice gets a new look of horror in her eyes as face begins to distort.  The back of Freddy's head begins emerge though Alice's face.  It keeps coming until his en neck and head pulls itself out and stares at her. FREDDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Alice.  Now we can really get to  know each other. Alice stares at him in disgust and terror.  Grabs his hea and shouts at the top of her lungs. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: The struggle begins.  Freddy shoots an arm out from behin her shoulder and tries to grab Alice in a headlock.  He's trying to take over from the inside out! Freddy's leg pushes its way out through her calf.  His ot arm snakes out from her torso.  Tries to choke her.  She  screams out in desperation and rage.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE OF DOOR
dialogues.text: as a brick tumbles loose and falls TOWARD CAMERA.  Yvonne face appears, peering into the gloom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice drops to her knees, falling through frame until her face fills the screen in an open-mouthed scream of anguis and pain. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out!  Get out!!

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: bathed in a stream of light from the shattered church win above her.  We hear Freddy's laugh coming from inside her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yvonne furiously picks and pries away at the bricks, tryi to widen the hole she's made at the bottom of the door. gets down on her hands and knees before the hole she's ma in the bricks.  She pushes against the cracked and rottin boards of the door.  They won't give...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice and Freddy locked in combat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yvonne throws herself at the boards of the door.  They sp under the impact and she flies into the room.  She gets t her knees and stares in awe at

dialogues.speaker: SISTER AMANDA
dialogues.text: kneeling on the dust covered floor, her back to Yvonne.

dialogues.speaker: YVONNE
dialogues.text: gets to her feet and cautiously approaches.

dialogues.speaker: ON AMANDA
dialogues.text: as Yvonne warily steps INTO SHOT, her hand slowly stretch out toward the nun's back.  As Yvonne is about to lay her hand on Armada's shoulder

dialogues.speaker: YVONNE AND AMANDA
dialogues.text: Amanda begins turning.  Cut to WIDE SHOT outside Amanda's open door.  Everything EXPLODES TOWARDS CAMERA - includin YVONNE.

dialogues.speaker: ON JACOB
dialogues.text: crying as he watches Alice, who is obviously losing the f with Freddy.  Amanda's voice, close by, suddenly cuts thr the sound of the struggle. AMANDA (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacob!  Alice will not triumph. Jacob looks up and around, puzzled.  Amanda is nowhere to seen.  Again, he hears her voice as if she were standing  behind him. AMANDA (O.S. cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only you can help her now, Jacob. With a snarl of anger, as if dismissing the thought, Jaco bounds up the bridge toward the struggling couple. JACOB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!  Leave her.  She's no fun anymore.   I want to go home now. Freddy looks at Jacob.  He sees a different boy, now.  A  nasty evil expression on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: his face begins to change.  Subtly at first, then not as is becoming more like Freddy. JACOB (cont'd) (in his Freddy's child voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go, I want to learn stuff from you. (a Freddy leer crosses his  face)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you teach me? Freddy at first looks suspicious, then smiles and extrica himself from Alice who is looking at Jacob in horror.  Fr gives her an obscene kiss as he separates from her.  She  sinks to the ground exhausted and beaten. Freddy approaches Jacob who smiles evilly.  Suddenly Fred stops.  He snarls as he sees something behind Jacob.   Jacob turns and sees Amanda, far above, silhouetted in th doorway to the asylum. AMANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, Jacob!  Unleash the power he has  given you! Jacob turns back and looks at Freddy. JACOB (Freddyized)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you, Krueger As he speaks, his mouth grows larger, impossibly large. violent wind appears to be rushing from him. Finally with a roar, the decrepit souls of DAN, GRETA and MARK rush from him and hurl themselves upon Freddy.  The  ectoplasmic trio strike Freddy full in the chest, ripping through him and emerging from his back.  As they doe so, pull him backwards towards Amanda.

dialogues.speaker: ON JACOB
dialogues.text: as the last of the souls leave him, his face returns to  normal and he falls out of frame, apparently dissolving a does so.

dialogues.speaker: ON FREDDY
dialogues.text: howling in anguish as he is dragged back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freddy's feet being dragged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freddy's back bulging as the souls drag him along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freddy's sleeves as the hands begin to disappear inwards. AMANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come home, my son.  All of us are waiting  for you now. Suddenly, with a sickening wrench, the Freddy fetus is ri out of his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freddy's clothes falling to the floor in a heap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Freddy Fetus emerging from a steaming pile of ectopla malevolently glaring at Amanda.

dialogues.speaker: ON ALICE
dialogues.text: As she sees the new BABY JACOB emerging from his pile of  clothes on the floor, she rushes to him and picks him up, cradling him tenderly in her arms.

dialogues.speaker: ON AMANDA
dialogues.text: who seizes the Freddy Fetus and holds it to her. AMANDA (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I forgive you, my son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as the two mothers simultaneously merge with their off- spring. Amanda shudders in silent agony as she accepts her son ba inside her.   As Alice receives Jacob, an optical effect surrounds them he is absorbed.  The effect coalesces into a single colum light which drives upwards, finally fading as the souls o Dan, Mark and Greta take their leave. Alice looks across at Amanda and starts towards her,  instinctively.  Amanda is now silhouetted again in the  doorway to the room of the maniacs. AMANDA (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't come near.  Take your son and  leave.

dialogues.speaker: ON AMANDA
dialogues.text: Sadly she turns to leave.  We think the fight is over, wh suddenly, grotesquely appearing from her back, Freddy's a shoots out.  Amanda gasps and clutches the doorway.  As a look of determination crosses her face, the arm is sucked back inside. A muffled howl of anguish echoes around as she steps thro the doorway into the room of 100 maniacs.  The SOUND of t maniacs rises to a crescendo.

dialogues.speaker: A SERIES OF DOORS
dialogues.text: starting with the one in front of Amanda, slam shut, one  after the next until the final door - right in front of A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear the echo of that final SLAM, then SILENCE.

dialogues.speaker: ALICE
dialogues.text: stands there, staring at the last door.  The SOUNDS OF A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bucolic.  Sunny.  Serene.  A picnic table rests beneath t shade of a tree in MIDDLE FOREGROUND.  Beyond it, childre romp and play.  The infant's CRYING grows LOUDER as  A BABY'S ARM moves into EXTREME FOREGROUND and stops.  Tw female arms reach in and lift a CRYING, cherubic infant. Follow the arms up to Alice, as she tenderly cradles JACO Yvonne steps INTO SHOT admiring the baby. YVONNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do good work, Alice. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So did Dan. CAMERA TRACKS as they move to the picnic table.  Alice ge shushes and rocks Jacob, who quiets down. YVONNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sure loves to stay awake. ALICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's okay.  He's got the rest of his  life to catch up on his sleep. Jacob closes his eyes, safely ensconced in his mother's a and drifts off to sleep. ALICE (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet dreams, Jacob Daniel.
